description:
Map errSSLPeerHandshakeFail to ERR_SSL_PROTOCOL_ERROR.
BUG=http://crbug.com/22623
TEST=Browse to https://www.bankalbilad.com.sa/retail/logon.do.  It should fallback from TLS to SSL and thus properly display the page instead of showing an error.

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=30406

messages.text:
LGTM.

I tested the site on Linux and Windows, and Chrome
correctly falls back to SSL 3.0.

http://codereview.chromium.org/347011/diff/1/2
File net/socket/ssl_client_socket_mac.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/347011/diff/1/2#newcode127
Line 127: case errSSLPeerHandshakeFail:
Please add the following comment for this case:
   case errSSLPeerHandshakeFail:  // Received a handshake_failure alert.

subject: Map errSSLPeerHandshakeFail to ERR_SSL_PROTOCOL_ERROR.
